channel.title: RS Wiki - Redirection Board, More Attention Needed etc
channel.description: The wiki needs more attention, so as a suggestion it should get a nice lovely redirecting board in the RS2 Dev category. Who knows maybe with a larger spot on the forum people will remember we in fact do have a wiki that contains important information! Maybe we will even get some more people contributing!

item.title: RS Wiki - Redirection Board, More Attention Needed etc
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:8, topic:543240”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=662115.msg4427785#msg4427785 date=1401658802]
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Special:RecentChanges

Who are the moderators again? Why aren’t you moderating?
[/quote]
lol did someone actually create an account just to try and ruin the wiki…?[/quote]

I would do something right now but I don’t remember my password and cannot even recover my account because I some how don’t have an email address with it.

Read full topic
item.source: RS Wiki - Redirection Board, More Attention Needed etc

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:543240”]Can I be considered a good boi now?

https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Special:Contributions/Arham_4[/quote]Not even close, https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?limit=50&tagfilter=&title=Special%3AContributions&contribs=user&target=Pure&namespace=&year=&month=-1
I have tons more to place but cba going through my notes
